sections.title: Daily Reset Process - Step by Step
items: 1. Check Telegram Room Reset Instructions for your section's requirements
2. Bring any OWN or HD chairs (permanent white tags) with you to new section
3. Go to your NEW section (not old one)
4. If DEPOSITING: Remove excess chairs from NEW section, remove reserved signs first, bring to central bank, post: '[Color] deposited [#]'
5. Place reserved signs in remaining chairs
6. If PICKING UP: Get chairs from central bank ONLY (never from walls or other sections), add to section, maintain aisle integrity, place reserved signs
7. Verify chairs are open, locked, stable
8. Count total, post: '[Color] [final#]' - Must match Room Reset Lead's posted number

sections.title: Common Mistakes to Avoid
items: Going to OLD section instead of NEW section
Taking chairs from walls (creates venue issues)
Moving OWN/HD chairs that should stay with participant
Depositing chairs with reserved signs still in them
Not verifying chair stability (creates safety issues)
Posting wrong count or no count at all

sections.title: Quick Troubleshooting
items: Count doesn't match Room Reset Lead? Recount immediately and report discrepancy

Participant's OWN chair won't open/lock? Report to Medicalâ€”they need a replacement
Confused about which section is yours? Check seating map posted in Telegram
Reserved signs missing? Report to Group Leadâ€”replacements available
